channel.title: Still can't login?!
channel.description:
Hello moparscape users, going to make this short so its not boring
cant login, portforwarded 43594, turned off firewall, set classpaths, made no-ip account, set client to connect to the ip swatscape.myftp.biz (the no-ip i made) and the server is online
only way i'm able to login is if i connect through the ip: localhost or 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 which are the default ip's that arn't usable by others
so i'm asking, why won't it login?

item.title: Still can't login?!
item.dc:creator: @DarkHeartBabe DarkHeartBabe
item.description:
@DarkHeartBabe wrote:

deathchaos is clueless aswell, anyone got any other ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Still can't login?!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Find you router here: http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm
Make sure that you did port forward correctly by following the default guide.

Edit: Your port forwarding is fine, the firewall is fine. It looks as though something is blocking the port.

Read full topic

item.title: Still can't login?!
item.dc:creator: @DarkHeartBabe DarkHeartBabe
item.description:
@DarkHeartBabe wrote:

@death, oh apparently i didn’t do it correctly then it said connection refused…

however im pretty sure i did it correctly…

Read full topic

item.title: Still can't login?!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“DarkHeartBabe, post:4, topic:362580”]@unfor, yes i portforwarded port 43594

@xsei, how do i use utorrent for it?[/quote]
Utorrent does the same thing as port forwarding, if you can’t login I imagine you didn’t port forward correctly.
Run your server, than go to this site and check the port and post what it says.
http://canyouseeme.org

Read full topic
